Title: The Test
Writer: Rebecca Sugar (creator), Hilary Florido, Katie Mitroff, Matt Burnett (story), Ben Levin (story), Rebecca Sugar (story), Ian Jones-Quartey (story), Kat Morris (story)
Actors: Zach Callison, Michaela Dietz, Estelle, Deedee Magno
Plot: Steven finds out that his mission to the Lunar Sea Spire was a test and demands a new one.
